column1: The Standard of Elendil was a standard that Aragorn bore on the Paths of the Dead
column2: made by Arwen.  It had a black field
column3: with seven stars wrought of gems
column4: a White Tree of Gondor for Gondor
column5: and a crown wrought of mithril and gold.  These were the signs of the house of Elendil
column6: which Aragorn unfurled at the Battle of the Pelennor Fields.
